schemes.name: PMFME – Prime Minister Formalization of Micro Food Processing Enterprises
schemes.department: Ministry of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI) & Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides credit-linked subsidy and capacity-building support for establishing and upgrading micro food processing enterprises including packaging, branding and marketing.
schemes.benefits: Enterprise formalization, improved processing capacity and better market access.
schemes.eligibility: Individual entrepreneurs, SHGs, FPOs and micro food processing units.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through PMFME portal or State Nodal Agency.

schemes.name: Support for Establishment of Millet Processing Units
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture & Karnataka Millet Mission
schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for establishment of millet cleaning, de-husking, grading, roasting and flour processing units.
schemes.benefits: Enhanced millet value addition, reduced post-harvest losses and better marketability.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, SHGs, farmer cooperatives and millet producer groups.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Karnataka Millet Mission or District Agriculture Office.

schemes.name: Women SHG Food Processing Enterprise Support
schemes.department: Department of Women & Child Development / NRLM
schemes.description: Provides seed capital, enterprise incubation support and marketing assistance for women-led food processing activities.
schemes.benefits: Women empowerment, income generation and enterprise sustainability.
schemes.eligibility: Women SHGs and registered self-employment groups under NRLM or Stree Shakti.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Taluk or District NRLM Mission Office.

schemes.name: FPO Processing & Primary Processing Unit Support
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture & Small Farmers Agribusiness Consortium
schemes.description: Supports establishment of primary processing, grading, cleaning and packaging infrastructure for FPO-based enterprises.
schemes.benefits: Stronger farmer value chains, improved aggregation and higher farmer income.
schemes.eligibility: Registered FPOs and Farmer Producer Cooperatives.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through SFAC or Department of Agriculture.

schemes.name: Startup Support for Agri & Food Processing Enterprises
schemes.description: Provides incubation, seed funding and mentorship support for agri and food processing startups.
schemes.benefits: Startup growth, innovation and job creation in agri value chains.
schemes.eligibility: Early-stage agritech and food processing startups registered in Karnataka.
